website_summaries.verdict: People generally like the 90s Valasion. This Adidas running shoe apparently offers cool aesthetics, a comfortable underfoot experience, and durability that is reliable. The overall design is also lauded for being versatile enough to handle any activity. The complaints revolve around the restrictive in-shoe feel and the limited breathability.Fans of neutral running shoes that can be used for any activity are the target market of the Adidas 90s Valasion.
pros: Most people believe that the underfoot cushioning offered by the Adidas 90s Valasion is comfortable
The ‘90s-inspired aesthetics of the silhouette is lauded by consumers who welcome nostalgia
A break-in period is not necessary, according to some consumers
this running shoe is agreeable from the get-go
The durability of this running shoe is welcomed by those who like long-lasting shoes
All-day use is attainable with the Adidas 90s Valasion because it has a form-welcoming structure, based on several reviews
cons: A few consumers believe the in-shoe experience is a bit restrictive
Some users have noted that breathability is not the strongest aspect of the 90s Valasion due to the abundance of leather overlays

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and comfortable everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've been walking on these kicks almost every day since December of 2019. I love how my feet never hurt after 5+Km of walking. These look great and are sturdy enough to use them for juggling a soccer ball (although I won't advise anyone to wear them for soccer). No wears so far. Would I purchase another pair again? Yes. I would consider a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: kenetth

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Seems like no shoe maker produces an athletic or casual shoe of medium or wide widths. Everything I have tried from Amazon has been too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: J.Beek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily drivers
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet and ordered 6.5, they fit nice! Always remember yo adjust the laces properly to yout feet's content before judging it. They look amazing classic Adidas look for day to day. They are very comfortable inside and mold to my feet well.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Salguero

customer_reviews.title: You'll love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes, and quite stylish too! If you're in the market for a new pair of shoes, give these a try! The size is true to fit for me. I notice some people talk about different brands and size differences, but I wear a 10 in Nike, New Balance and Skechers, and that's the size I bought for these. They fit great! Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: hurts in my feet
customer_reviews.text: This is actually one of the worst adidas shoes ever, I've worn it like 4 times and it already started to get deformed, it also hurts and not comfortable at all, I got the black and white one, idk about others.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Louly

customer_reviews.title: All Kinds of Foot Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but trouble with these, and I have been wearing Adidas for over 30 years. My toes are crammed, even with stretching. I normally wear 10.5 M from them, and this is the size I have, but it is literally brusing my feet. Love the way they look, but I am going to donate these and go back to Duramo for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Pastor

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I went with a size 11. I generally run between 10.5-11. Glad I went with the 11.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Practical every day pair
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable quality shoe, light weight and sturdy at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than picture shown on amazon. Fitting may vary lil
customer_reviews.author: Krishan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband was looking for. Comfort and stylish
customer_reviews.author: 4boysmom

customer_reviews.title: all good!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a firmer sole and flexible upper with a blucher opening
customer_reviews.author: Dick Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair of Adidas Walking Shoes, A Bit Tight
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and solid pair of shoes, though the black on white I received were 12.5 and I've bought several different pairs of Adidas, all 12.5 perfect fit with no issues, and these were too tight for some reason, so I attempted to order another pair of same color scheme, but they were sold out in my original color scheme by then, so instead I had to opt for white on black color scheme instead of same shoe style.
customer_reviews.author: Trav Tedesco

product_meta.title: adidas Men's 90s Valasion Sneaker
feature_bullets: The adidas brand has a long history and deep-rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport

Driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation as well as decades of accumulating sports science expertise, we cater for all, from elite professional athletes and teams to any individual who wants to able sport part of their lives
